task.title: SVG
task.shortdesc: The SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) file format canbe selected from the Add-A-Plotter Wizard. Users can plot their drawings to SVG file format to create an interactive vector graphics for the web design or the other specific workflows that require SVG files

context.p: To export a drawing to a DWF file

step.cmd: Choose File > Plot from the mainmenu.
Choose .pc5 for the Name option from the Printer/plotter area on the Plot dialog box.
Specify the location and the name for the DWF file in Browse for Plot File dialog box.
